alert.note: Alert for Muskingum; Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MUSKINGUM AND WEST CENTRAL NOBLE COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Zanesville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, South Zanesville, North Zanesville, Philo, Pleasant Grove, Chandlersville, Ruraldale, Cannelville, High Hill, Duncan Falls, Drake, and Blue Rock State Park. This includes Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 150 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
